title: Pocket Hose Top Brass - #1 Expandable Garden Hose
description: The #1 Best Selling Expandable Hose just got better and three times stronger. The leak-proof hose is made with new Dura Rib Technology, making it even more flexible! It also has brass connector protectors on both ends to attach to any outdoor water faucet. The Pocket Hose Top Brass expands with water pressure and contracts when you’re done, so you can easily store it away. It’s the perfect hose for any home!

asset.author: BulbHead
asset.description: The #1 Best Selling Expandable Hose just got better and three times stronger. The leak-proof hose is made with new Dura Rib Technology, making it even more flexible! It also has brass connector protectors on both ends to attach to any outdoor water faucet. The Pocket Hose Top Brass expands with water pressure and contracts when you’re done, so you can easily store it away. It’s the perfect hose for any home!

transcripts: Are you tired of wrestling with your old fashioned hose? Is it heavy and hard to carry? Does it tangle and kink? get the light weigh hose that won't tangle or kink. The amazing new Pocket Hose Top Brass, now the number one selling expandable hose in the world is new and improved. Just turn on the water and the hose just grows and grows. Only top grass has the expandable inner rib cage engineered to give you superior strength. Just turn off the water and it goes away. It's quitting time. And, unlike your ordinary hose, top brass will never kink ever. Even when tied in a knot, it unties itself. Now that's a real home improvement. And Top Brass is a full 3/4 inch hose unlike the other expandable hoses. It's a bigger, better, pocket hose. Other hose fittings collapse under pressure, but our super strong connectors withstand the pressure. An d only the Pocket Hose Top Brass has the no kink connector protector. Yet it;s still so light weight, you can take it anywhere. And look at this, the Top Brass contracts when you're done. It's putting itself away. Look here's your fifty foot hose, and here's our fifty foot top brass. Which would you choose? I'd pick the pocket hose.
